entry.title: Impalaæ‰€æœ‰ç«¯å£
entry.content:
Impalaæ‰€æœ‰ç«¯å£
Scope / Role Startup Flag Default Port Comment
Impala Daemon â€“beeswax_port 21000 Port on which Beeswax client requests are served by Impala Daemons.
Impala Daemon â€“hs2_port 21050 Port on which HiveServer2 client requests are served by Impala Daemons.
Impala Daemon â€“be_port 22000 Internal use only. Impala daemons use this port for Thrift based communication with each other.
Impala Daemon â€“state_store_subscriber_port 23000 Internal use only. Impala daemons listen on this port for updates from the StateStore daemon.
Catalog Daemon â€“state_store_subscriber_port 23020 Internal use only. The Catalog Server daemon listens on this port for updates from the StateStore daemon.
Impala Daemon â€“webserver_port 25000 Impala debug Web UI for administrators to monitor and troubleshoot.
Impala StateStore Daemon â€“webserver_port 25010 StateStore debug Web UI for administrators to monitor and troubleshoot.
Impala Catalog Daemon â€“webserver_port 25020 Catalog Server debug Web UI for administrators to monitor and troubleshoot. New in Impala 1.2 and higher.
Impala StateStore Daemon â€“state_store_port 24000 Internal use only. The StateStore daemon listens on this port for registration/unregistration requests.
Impala Catalog Daemon â€“catalog_service_port 26000 Internal use only. The Catalog Server uses this port to communicate with the Impala daemons. New in Impala 1.2 and higher.
Impala Daemon â€“krpc_port 27000 Internal use only. Impala daemons use this port for KRPC based communication with each other.
Impala Daemon â€“hs2_http_port 28000 Used to transmit commands and receive results by client applications over HTTP via the HiveServer2 protocol.
